ingredients: 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons olive oil, divided,   +   1/2 teaspoon paprika,   salt to taste, 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips, 1  red bell pepper, cubed, 1 bunch scallions, trimmed and sliced into 1/2-inch lengths, 1 (12 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained and juice reserved, 1 tablespoon cornstarch
nutrition: Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 65mg 22%, Sodium 783mg 34%, Total Carbohydrate 22g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 26g, Vitamin C 57mg 284%, Calcium 69mg 5%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 548mg 12%
